Package: org.ajoberstar.gradle.git.release.semver

[Groovy] Class RebuildVersionStrategy

    • org.ajoberstar.gradle.git.release.semver.RebuildVersionStrategy
    • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
      VersionStrategy

      class RebuildVersionStrategy

      Strategy that infers the version based on the tag on the current HEAD.

      • Field Summary

          Fields 
          Modifiers Name Description
          static RebuildVersionStrategy  INSTANCE

      • Methods Summary

          Methods 
          Type Name and description
          java.lang.String getName()
          ReleaseVersion infer(Project project, Grgit grgit)
          Infers the version based on the version tag on the current HEAD with the highest precendence.
          boolean selector(Project project, Grgit grgit)
          Determines whether this strategy should be used to infer the version.

      • Inherited Methods Summary

          Inherited Methods 
          Methods inherited from class Name

      • Field Detail

        • public static final RebuildVersionStrategy INSTANCE

      • Method Detail

        • @java.lang.Override java.lang.String getName()

        • @java.lang.Override ReleaseVersion infer(Project project, Grgit grgit)

          Infers the version based on the version tag on the current HEAD with the highest precendence.

        • @java.lang.Override boolean selector(Project project, Grgit grgit)

          Determines whether this strategy should be used to infer the version.

          • Return false, if any project properties starting with "release." are set.
          • Return false, if there aren't any tags on the current HEAD that can be parsed as a version.
          • Return true, otherwise.
